name: HandWashingSong
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hand washing song
Developer Terms of Use
des: Sings a quick, 20 second song to help you thoroughly wash your hands. Wet your hands with clean, running water (warm or cold), turn off the tap, apply soap, and scrub along to the song! Procedures recommended by the CDC: https://www.cdc.gov/handwashing/show-me-the-science-handwashing.html
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
